titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan.
To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

bill.summary: Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to replace a specified high priority engineering project in Michigan with another project that is designed to conduct a transportation needs study and make improvements to 1-75 interchanges in the Grayling area.
